title: MANITOBA HYDRO

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with MANITOBA HYDRO. The average
  contract duration was 0.34 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $115.0K.
  The longest contract was 7.78 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $1.0M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '50'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '0'
